mapper.select: /* Membermapper.xml.findByEmail 회원정보 리턴 By email */ SELECT email , password , state FROM MEMBERS WHERE 1=1 AND email = #{email}

/* Membermapper.xml.findByUsername 회원 전체 정보 리턴 by username */ SELECT usr_id , username , password , email , nick_name , pwd_wrong , state , profile_img , locale_lat , locale_lon , sex , birth FROM MEMBERS WHERE 1=1 AND username = #{username}

/* Membermapper.xml.findByUsername 회원 전체 정보 리턴 by userId */ SELECT usr_id , username , password , email , nick_name , pwd_wrong , state , profile_img , locale_lat , locale_lon , sex , birth FROM MEMBERS WHERE 1=1 AND usr_id = #{usrId}
